languages.text: "Гонцы Великого пожирателя... Моя раса умеет вычислять этих оборотней, но тебе стоит быть осторожн{mf|ым|ой}, элантах. Для расы столь психически слабой, как мон-кай, их появление может стать приговором".

"The messengers of the Great Devourer... My kin can sense the shapeshifters, but you should stay vigilant, elantach. For a species as psychically weak as the mon-keigh, their arrival may spell death."
languages.original_text: "Гонцы Великого пожирателя... Моя раса умеет вычислять этих оборотней, но тебе стоит быть осторожн{mf|ым|ой}, элантах. Для расы столь психически слабой, как мон-кай, их появление может стать приговором".

traits.locale_text: "The messengers of the Great Devourer... My race can sense those shapeshifters, but you should stay vigilant, elantach. For a race with such weak psyche as the mon-keigh, their appearance can prove deadly."

"The messengers of the Great Devourer... My kin can sense the shapeshifters, but you should stay vigilant, elantach. For a species as psychically weak as the mon-keigh, their arrival may spell death."

languages.text: “他们是大吞噬者的使者……我的族人可以辨识出那些变形者，但你应该保持警惕，外界人。对于像猴子灵能孱弱的种族来说，他们的到来很可能意味着死亡。”
languages.original_text: "The messengers of the Great Devourer... My kin can sense the shapeshifters, but you should stay vigilant, elantach. For a species as psychically weak as the mon-keigh, their arrival may spell death."

traits.locale_text: “他们是大吞噬者的使者……我的族人可以辨识出那些变形者，但你应该保持警惕，外界人。对于像猴子灵能孱弱的种族来说，他们的到来很可能意味着死亡。”

languages.text: «Los mensajeros del Gran Devorador... Mi gente puede sentir a los cambiaformas, pero debes permanecer alerta, elantach. Para una especie tan débil en lo psíquico como los mon-keigh, su llegada puede resultar mortal».
languages.original_text: "The messengers of the Great Devourer... My kin can sense the shapeshifters, but you should stay vigilant, elantach. For a species as psychically weak as the mon-keigh, their arrival may spell death."

traits.locale_text: «Los mensajeros del Gran Devorador... Mi gente puede sentir a los cambiaformas, pero debes permanecer alerta, elantach. Para una especie tan débil en lo psíquico como los mon-keigh, su llegada puede resultar mortal».

languages.text: 「偉大なるディヴァウアーの使者...我が親族はシェイプシフターを感知できるが、星外人よ、用心するに越したことはない。モン＝ケイのように体弱い種族にとって、奴らの出現は命取りになりかねないからな」
languages.original_text: "The messengers of the Great Devourer... My kin can sense the shapeshifters, but you should stay vigilant, elantach. For a species as psychically weak as the mon-keigh, their arrival may spell death."

traits.locale_text: 「偉大なるディヴァウアーの使者...我が種族はシェイプシフターを感知できるが、星外人よ、用心するに越したことはない。モン＝ケイのように超能力が弱い種族にとって、奴らの出現は命取りになりかねないからな」

languages.text: « Les messagers du Grand Dévoreur... Les miens sont capables de détecter les changeurs de forme, mais vous devriez rester sur vos gardes, elantach. Pour les espèces à la psyché faible comme les mon-keigh, leur maîtrise des apparences peut se révéler dévastatrice. »
languages.original_text: "The messengers of the Great Devourer... My kin can sense the shapeshifters, but you should stay vigilant, elantach. For a species as psychically weak as the mon-keigh, their arrival may spell death."

traits.locale_text: « Les messagers du Grand Dévoreur... Les miens sont capables de détecter les changeurs de forme, mais vous devriez rester sur vos gardes, elantach. Pour les espèces à la psyché faible comme les mon-keigh, leur maîtrise des apparences peut se révéler dévastatrice. »

languages.text: "Die Boten des Großen Verschlingers ... Meinesgleichen kann die Gestaltwandler sehen, aber Ihr solltet wachsam bleiben, Elantach. Für eine psychisch so schwache Spezies wie die Chem-Pan-Sey könnte ihre Ankunft den sicheren Tod bedeuten."
languages.original_text: "The messengers of the Great Devourer... My kin can sense the shapeshifters, but you should stay vigilant, elantach. For a species as psychically weak as the mon-keigh, their arrival may spell death."

traits.locale_text: "Die Boten des Großen Verschlingers ... Meinesgleichen kann die Gestaltwandler sehen, aber Ihr solltet wachsam bleiben, Elantach. Für eine psychisch so schwache Spezies wie die Chem-Pan-Sey könnte ihre Ankunft den sicheren Tod bedeuten."

languages.text: "Büyük Yutucu'nun habercileri... Soydaşlarım, şekil değiştirenleri sezebilir ancak dikkati elden bırakmamalısın elantach. Mon-keighler kadar ruhsezi gücü zayıf bir ırk için görünümleri ölümcül olabilir."
languages.original_text: "The messengers of the Great Devourer... My kin can sense the shapeshifters, but you should stay vigilant, elantach. For a species as psychically weak as the mon-keigh, their arrival may spell death."
